channel.title: R Packages on Factions and Figures
channel.description: Recent content in R Packages on Factions and Figures

item.title: dealing with missing data
item.description: We meet a great guy, Nick, who is based out of Monash Uni. He’s made two cool packages that deal with missing data! narnia devtools::install_github("njtierney/narnia") library(narnia) and visdat devtools::install_github("njtierney/visdat") library(visdat) Might be useful for things like “HoursWorked” in H.
